testcase.name: User can get clusters
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User see clusters ... passed Then Response is "200" ... passed And Response list of list clusters:"[u'hadoop']" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://172.18.79.139:9000/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters response = 200
200 == 200 [u'hadoop'] == [u'hadoop']

testcase.name: User can create cluster
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When name:"QAcluster" and im_id="d9342ba8-4c51-441c-8d5b-f9e14a901299" and n_n="jt_nn.medium" and count="1" and d_n="tt_dn.small" and count="1" ... passed And User create cluster ... passed Then Response is "202" ... passed
Captured stdout: URL = http://172.18.79.139:9000/v0.2/6b26f08455ec449ea7a2d3da75339255/clusters data = {"cluster": {"node_templates": {"jt_nn.medium": "1", "tt_dn.small": "1"}, "name": "QAcluster", "base_image_id": "d9342ba8-4c51-441c-8d5b-f9e14a901299"}} response = 202
202 == 202

testcase.name: User can get clusters

200 == 200 [u'hadoop', u'QAcluster'] == [u'hadoop', u'QAcluster']

testcase.name: User can get cluster by ID
User can delete cluster by ID
testcase.system-out:
Steps: When User delete cluster with id:"0" ... passed Then Response is "204" ... passed

204 == 204
